title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the updated column names that were set as aliases.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a new data source and dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
